caption.p: Volatile oil composition in the leaves ( a), comparison of the variable sites in the matK sequence ( b), comparison of the variable sites in the 18S rRNA sequence ( c) and cluster trees of both the matK and 18S rRNA gene sequences ( d) of Pogostemon cablin (Blanco) Benth. from 6 different locations. The top number indicates the nucleotide position upstream of the matK ( b) and the 18S rRNA ( c) sequence, an asterisk (*) indicates the same nucleotide as the P1 sequence, and a hyphen (—) indicates an alignment gap ( c)
